ProductInfo.Features:
Android 2.2-powered smartphone with 3.2-inch touchscreen and easy access to your Favorite contacts, YouTube and Facebook
Access a wealth of Google mobile services including Google Maps for turn-by-turn directions, Gmail, Google Talk, Calendar and more
GPS-enabled for location services; Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g); 3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD   expansion (4 GB card included)
Up to 7.5 hours of talk time, up to 500 hours (20.8 days) of standby time
What's in the Box: LG Ally handset, rechargeable battery, wall/USB charger, 4 GB microSD memory card, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: LG Ally VS740 Android Phone, Rooted for Advanced Users - NO CONTRACT (Verizon Wireless)
